name: Journey of the Black Rose
blurb: A SNES era Final Fantasy style RPG following the story of Menarra Darkblade, a dark and complicated assassin, and an unlikely hero.

rewards.reward: No Reward
--Helping Hand--\r\nYou feel good about yourself and help my project inch towards further funding.  Thank you, every dollar helps.

--Showing Interest--\r\nYou will receive access to a special section of the game's Forums once they are brought online that non-backers will never have access to.  This section will have more interaction with myself than the public sections, and will recieve sneak-peaks and personal speculations before they appear in public sections in most cases.
--Definite Interest--\r\nYou will receive a digital copy of the game when it is completed, as well as access to the backer-only section of the forums listed in the $5 reward.

--Sign me up!--\r\nYou will receive a digital copy of the game when it is completed, access to the backer-only section of the forums, a special backer-only Forum badge, and your name at the end of the game's credits in a (hopefully) massive list!
--Sign me up! (but more than that guy!)--\r\nSame as the $20 --Sign me up!-- tier, but your name will be in a special "1337 Backers" section just before the end of the credits.

--Sounds great, give me more!--\r\nYou will receive access to Beta builds as the game is nearing completion, and can help me find those elusive typos and bugs to squash for the final release!  You will also recieve everything in the $25 tier.
--More, more, more!--\r\nYou receive everything in the $35 tier, as well as a special digital piece of commissioned concept art of Menarra herself!

--Alpha me!--\r\nYou receive all previous rewards, as well as access to earlier Alpha builds of the game as it exits initial development, far earlier than the Beta builds.  Be warned, in this early stage, things will not be finalized, possibly including integral systems such as Combat.  Alpha will be the time to test everything as it stands and decide what systems to keep and what systems to change going into Beta.  You will have direct input in a special Alpha-Only forum section to help test and make suggestions and give feedback, your opinions will help shape the final game!

--Dedicate me! Gravestone--\r\nYou receive all previous rewards, your name in the "Blessed Backers" section of the credits, before the "1337" credits, and an ingame reference to your name (or another name of your choice, it must be an appropriate name to appear in the game) on a gravestone somewhere inside the game world!  Please note the location of the gravestone is not up to you, but I will inform you of where your gravestone is located.

--Dedicate me! Statue--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no gravestone), your name in the "Blessed Backers" section of the credits, before the "1337" credits, and an ingame reference to your name (or another name of your choice, it must be an appropriate name to appear in the game) on a statue somewhere inside the game world!  Please note the exact statue and purpose of the statue is not up to you, it will fit into the region of the game it is placed in.  I will inform you of where your statue is located.

--Dedicate me! Shrine--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no gravestone/statue), your name in the "Blessed Backers" section of the credits, before the "1337" credits, and an ingame reference to your name (or another name of your choice, it must be an appropriate name to appear in the game) on a shrine somewhere inside the game world, including at least one worshipper NPC!  Please note the exact shrine and purpose of the shrine/NPC(s) is not up to you, it will fit into the region of the game it is placed in.  I will inform you of where your shrine is located.

--Give me Development!--\r\nYou will receive all previous non-limitted rewards (no gravestone/statue/shrine),your name in the "Blessed Backers" section of the credits, before the "1337" credits,  as well as Development-stage access to extremely early, rough versions of the game, while the world is still being built and content still being developed and implemented.  Please note this stage of the game will be very limited, and some builds may not have monster encounters (thus no way to level) due to me testing areas as they are built and not wanting to be annoyed ;)  You will have access to an exclusive Dev-stage thread on the forums where I will post Dev releases and progress updates, as well as any ramblings or rants during this early stage, before they are posted in any other section.

--Name a weapon! Dagger--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no gravestone/statue/shrine/other named weapon), your name in the "1337" credits, and you get to name a Dagger weapon in the game and tell me how useful it is, and at what stage of the game you should acquire it.  (Beginning, Early, Mid, Late, Endgame)  Please note I will not create an uber-weapon, it will be balanced based on it's intended usefulness at the stage it is intended to be found.  However, I am not opposed to making an uber-useless weapon for laughs if that is your wish ;)  Also, appropriate names only.  Only characters that can use Daggers will be able to wield these.

--Name a weapon! Sword--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no gravestone/statue/shrine/other named weapon), your name in the "Blessed Backers" section of the credits, before the "1337" credits, and you get to name a Sword weapon in the game and tell me how useful it is, and at what stage of the game you should acquire it.  (Beginning, Early, Mid, Late, Endgame)  Please note I will not create an uber-weapon, it will be balanced based on it's intended usefulness at the stage it is intended to be found.  However, I am not opposed to making an uber-useless weapon for laughs if that is your wish ;)  Also, appropriate names only.  Only characters that can use Swords will be able to wield these.

--Name a weapon! Mace/Hammer--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no gravestone/statue/shrine/other named weapon), your name in the "Blessed Backers" section of the credits, before the "1337" credits, and you get to name a Mace or Hammer weapon in the game and tell me how useful it is, and at what stage of the game you should acquire it.  (Beginning, Early, Mid, Late, Endgame)  Please note I will not create an uber-weapon, it will be balanced based on it's intended usefulness at the stage it is intended to be found.  However, I am not opposed to making an uber-useless weapon for laughs if that is your wish ;)  Also, appropriate names only.  Only characters that can use a Mace/Hammer will be able to wield these.

--Name a weapon! Staff--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no gravestone/statue/shrine/other named weapon), your name in the "Blessed Backers" section of the credits, before the "1337" credits, and you get to name a Staff weapon in the game and tell me how useful it is, and at what stage of the game you should acquire it.  (Beginning, Early, Mid, Late, Endgame)  Please note I will not create an uber-weapon, it will be balanced based on it's intended usefulness at the stage it is intended to be found.  However, I am not opposed to making an uber-useless weapon for laughs if that is your wish ;)  Also, appropriate names only.  Only characters that can use Staves will be able to wield these.  You will be told where your particular weapon is located.

--Create a weapon!--
You receive all previous non-limited rewards (no gravestone/statue/shrine/other named weapon), your name in the "Blessed Backers" section of the credits, before the "1337" credits, and you will communicate with me (via email/skype/phone/etc) to create a completely custom weapon!
You will help decide all of the following::
*What stage of the game it is found
*How good it should be (no ubers!)
*Weapon Type, even if I hadn't planned that weapon type in the game, I will work it in!
*Design and Pixel Art!  If you are artistically inclined, you can create your own 32-bit pixel art animation based on the grid reference I give you, or you can give ideas and we will come up with the art together for how it will appear ingame!  You will be told where your particular weapon is located.

--Immortalize me! Basic NPC--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no grave/statue/shrine/weapon/other NPC), your name in the "Immortal Backers" section of the credits, before the "Blessed Backers" credits, and will work with me to provide a basic NPC for the game, bearing your name or a name of your choosing (appropriate names only!)  This NPC will have no important bearing to the game, simply a name and a few basic greetings.  You help decide their features and race, the final art is on me.  I will inform you of where the NPC is located in the game.

--Immortalize me! Interactive NPC--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no grave/statue/shrine/weapon/other NPC), your name in the "Immortal Backers" section of the credits, before the "Blessed Backers" credits, and will work with me to provide am interactive NPC for the game, bearing your name or a name of your choosing (appropriate names only!)  This NPC will be interactive as some sort of vendor, merchant, or Innkeeper.  You help decide their features and race, the final art  and purpose is on me.  I will inform you of where the NPC is located in the game.

--Immortalize me! Important NPC--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no grave/statue/shrine/weapon/other NPC), your name in the "Immortal Backers" section of the credits, before the "Blessed Backers" credits, and will work with me to provide an important NPC for the game, bearing your name or a name of your choosing (appropriate names only!)  This NPC will have some bearing in a quest or in the main storyline.  You help decide their features and race, the final art  and purpose is on me.  I will inform you of where the NPC is located in the game.

--Immortalize me! NPC House--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no grave/statue/shrine/weapon/other NPC), your name in the "Immortal Backers" section of the credits, before the "Blessed Backers" credits, and will work with me to provide a basic NPC for the game, bearing your name or a name of your choosing (appropriate names only!)  This NPC will have no bearing on the game.  You help decide their features and race, the final art  and purpose is on me.  You also get to help design the home the NPC lives in, up to 10x10 in space on the exterior (1x1 is 32x32 pixels).  We will work together to design the exterior and interior with available resources/textures, or if you are artistically inclined, you can provide your own textures in the proper 32x32 format and I will use them to build the house.  I will inform you of where the NPC House is located in the game.

--Immortalize me! NPC Shop--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no grave/statue/shrine/weapon/NPC/NPC House), your name in the "Immortal Backers" section of the credits, before the "Blessed Backers" credits, and will work with me to provide a basic NPC for the game, bearing your name or a name of your choosing (appropriate names only!)  This NPC will have no bearing on the game.  You help decide their features and race, the final art  and purpose is on me.  You also get to help design the shop the NPC works in, up to 10x10 in space on the exterior (1x1 is 32x32 pixels).  We will work together to design the exterior and interior with available resources/textures, or if you are artistically inclined, you can provide your own textures in the proper 32x32 format and I will use them to build the shop.  I will inform you of where the NPC Shop is located in the game.

--Immortalize me! Name a Settlement and its Leader--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no grave/statue/shrine/weapon/NPC/NPC House/NPC Shop) and will provide a name for one of the settlements in the game.  The location, size, and purpose of the settlement are up to me.  You will also help design the basic appearance and name of the leader of the settlement.  (appropriate names only!)

--Immortalize me! Private Island--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no grave/statue/shrine/weapon/NPC/NPC House/NPC Shop/Settlement), your name in the "Immortal Backers" section of the credits, before the "Blessed Backers" credits, and help design a private island in the ocean.  The island's overworld appearance will be very small, and when you set foot on it will take you to an Exterior cell where we will work together to design the exterior and interior (if applicable) details of the island with available resources/textures, or if you are artistically inclined, you can provide your own textures in the proper 32x32 format and I will use them to build the island so long as they fit the style of the game.  You decide the general purpose of the island, whether it has a settlement, what race that settlement would be (or mixed), and one unique identifying feature, be it a dungeon (you provide the basic type/theme, I build it), a special Monster only found there (from a list I provide, nothing custom unless you can provide properly formatted sprites and animations of your own design, nothing copyright), etc.  I will inform you of where the Island is located in the game.

--Immortalize me! Boss--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (no grave/statue/shrine/weapon/NPC/NPC House/NPC Shop/Settlement/Island), your name in the "Immortal Backers" section of the credits, before the "Blessed Backers" credits, and you get to help me design a boss fight.  We will look through available Boss animation resources and you will help choose the name, general appearance, abilities, and general purpose of the boss.  The final application of the boss, and it's location and relevance to the main storyline, are up to me.  I will inform you where the custom boss is located.

--Give me Double!--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (you know what they are by now), your name in the "Immortal Backers" section of the credits, before the "Blessed Backers" credits, and may choose any two different of the following limited reward subjects:: Gravestone, Statue, Shrine, Create a Custom Weapon, basic NPC, interactive NPC, Important NPC, NPC House, NPC Shop, Name a Settlement and its Leader,  Help design a Boss, or a Private Island!  Refer to the previous limited rewards for the relevant description of each of these choices.

--Give me Food!--\r\nYou receive all previous non-limited rewards (you know what they are by now), your name near the start of the credits as "Kickstarter Producer" exclusive to you alone, and can arrange a trip out to meet me in person over a nice lunch, my treat, of a cuisine of your choice (Steakhouse, Seafood, McDonald's, etc, or I'll cook for you myself if you want, I have 2 years of culinary schooling and know my way around the kitchen!)  During the meal, we will chat and small talk, and discuss the game or whatever you feel like talking about.  Afterwards, you will help me design a part of the game.  This will be designing a more in-depth Private Island than in the other reward tier, we will work together to pick a location, design the Exterior Cell, design a settlement on the island, and design a dungeon on the island.  I will also let you choose a style of statue to dedicate to yourself and help choose a place to put it.  You will also help me create an NPC near that statue with basic greetings you help write.  IMPORTANT!!!: You are responsible for your own travel.  I am located in Southern Indiana, near New Albany.  If you are within driving distance, great!  If you have to fly, I will be happy to pick you up at Louisville International Airport in Louisville KY right across the river, that is the closest airport.  Plan for a 2 day visit, I will help you locate lodging nearby.  I will pay for or prepare Lunch or Dinner once each of the 2 days you are here, and we will spend about 5 hours (maybe more if we really get into it and have the energy!) each day working on the details of your additions to the game.  I will also mail you a USB drive containing the final game, the artwork, and a few other goodies when the game is completed.  I will also be in touch with you during development as much as needed to make sure your Private Island is completed if we don't get it done during your visit.  If you are unable to arrange a visit, we will communicate as much as needed to get your Island done the way you like, including sending you exclusive builds of the game while I am working on your island so you can give feedback during it's creation, and I'll send you a $100 giftcard for a restaurant of your choice (that I have access to gift cards for) to make up for not being able to have lunch with me, but I really hope if you pledge this tier that you can make the trip!
